mainContent.heading: What is the Age Verification Popup Section?
paragraphs: The Age Verification Popup section adds a simple and effective age gate to your Shopify store.
It prompts visitors to confirm their age before accessing your storefront, helping you manage age-restricted products such as alcohol, tobacco, or similar items.
The popup is designed to be clear, user-friendly, and visually consistent with your theme while supporting compliance and customer trust.
